original: Nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: nasa āsavam dhammam paṭicca nasa āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā nasa āsavam dhamma

original: paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasāsavo
analyzed: paṭicca na anāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca na sa āsavaḥ

original: ca naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca na anāsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na anāsavam dhammam paṭicca na anāsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasāsavañca naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sāsavañca na anāsavañca dhammam paṭicca na anāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca sabbattha vitthāro
